name: Cake Ninja 2
description:
Ninja hates all sweets and cakes, because the calories in them have made his Ninja wife put on weight, making her an ineffective Ninja. There is only one way to save his Ninja wife... destroy all the cakes before she can eat them!

Cake Ninja 2 is a simple casual game (slice-em-up) where you slide the stylus across the screen to slice cakes into small pieces like a true Ninja warrior. It’s very easy to play. The more cakes you slice, the longer you stay around, and the longer you survive, the higher your score. How long can you last?

You can also challenge your friends to a multiplayer game to show everyone who's the best Cake Ninja!

• Simple, addictive gameplay

• Colorful 3D graphics

• Unlockable achievements

• Challenging multiplayer mode
